function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Contagious diseases may spread through the use of telemedicine platforms, such as the 5G+ teleconsultation and diagnosis platforms mentioned.","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases and potential strain on healthcare systems.","Mitigation":"Strict protocols for sanitization, usage, and monitoring of telemedicine equipment and platforms. Implementation of virtual triage and isolation procedures.","Technologies":"Advanced sanitization and sterilization technologies, virtual reality based triage systems, and remote monitoring tools.","People":"Patients, healthcare professionals, and caregivers using the telemedicine platforms.","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, telecommunication companies, and technology providers."}]}
